title: Base64 Encoder
description: Convert files and images to Base64 format for embedding in email templates, HTML surveys, or image-based field entries.
fullDescription: Convert files and images to Base64 format for embedding in email templates, HTML surveys, or image-based field entries. Streamlines asset embedding in no-code environments. Supports batch processing, multiple file formats, and provides optimization suggestions for better performance and compatibility. Features drag-and-drop interface, format validation, and automated compression options.
